Class NodeComponent

java.lang.Object
fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
components.NodeComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentInterface, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI, CommunicationCI, NetworkNodeServicesCI, Remote
Direct Known Subclasses:
AccessPointComponent, InternalNodeComponent
public class NodeComponent extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent implements NetworkNodeServicesCI
Composant representant un element du reseau pair a pair Les points d acces et les elements internes etendent ce composant

    • execute

      public void execute() throws Exception
      Description copied from interface: fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI
      execute a task on the component after all components have been started; this method is automatically called by the component virtual machine after all components have been started and the component calls in turn its own inner components. Implementations of this method can keep the control as long as they wish (contrary to start) but they need to begin by a call to super if inner components also have an execute method to be called; it is the responsibility of programmers to make sure that this does not provoke deadlocks.

      Contract

       pre    isStarted()
 post   true            // no postcondition.
      Specified by:
      execute in interface fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI
      Overrides:
      execute in class fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      Throws:
      Exception - to do.
      See Also:
      ComponentI.execute()
